concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for the 1.0 version of the Kafka connector.

concept.title: Couchbase Kafka Connector 1.0.0 GA (4 May 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 1.0.0 is the initial general availability (GA) release of the Kafka connector. It implements basic data streaming from Couchbase to Kafka with user-defined filtering and encoding.

section.title: New features and behavioral changes
section.p: This release contains the following features:

ul.li: Filtering of DCP streams by subclassing com.couchbase.kafka.coder.AbstractEncoder.
Encoding Kafka values by implementing com.couchbase.kafka.filter.Filter.
